availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James F. Ware (Cynthiana, Kentucky, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Cynthiana, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas and Harriet Ware. Clerk in Harrison County Circuit Court from 1850 to 1864.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "James F. Ware (1828-1868)," Memorial #146306713, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146306713 (accessed November 15, 2019).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison, District 1, p.61A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison, Cynthiana, 577.
KYR-0001-004-0388.
